role_dependencies: Installs Java on nearly any OS
Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that sets up SSH with secure settings and also allows the user to populate SSH key files via configurable variables
role_description_full_overview: On top of tightening up SSH security settings, this role also installs fail2ban on Linux systems. If provided, the role will also populate all your SSH keys and set their permissions appropriately
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that sets up SSH with secure settings and also allows the user to populate SSH key files via configurable variables.
